text.p: 3/day, regain 1d6 hit points when you hit an enemy with a melee attack.
You have advantage on Constitution checks to resist injury, poison, or endure extreme environments.
You get up from dying with 1 hit point on a natural d20 roll of 18-20.
3/day, when you are reduced to 0 HP, make a DC 18 Constitution check (the Implacable talent applies to this roll). On a success, you instead go to 1 HP.
